panels.title: Volume Selisih Inflow Outflow Transaksi QRIS Realtime (Rp Milyar)

themeEditor.name: custom

targets.rawSql:
with  a as (
  SELECT 
    --CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),trx_date,120) trx_date
    trx_date
    ,convert(decimal(18,2),SUM(jumlah_transaksi)/1000) transaction_frequency
  FROM [QRIS].[dbo].[incoming_QRIS_EXT_BRI_DAILY]
  WHERE 
    DATEDIFF(DAY,trx_date,GETDATE()) < 30 
  GROUP BY 
    trx_date
    --CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),trx_date,120)
)
select 
  SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR,trx_date,105),1,2) trx_date
  ,transaction_frequency metrics_value
from a
order by a.trx_date

with  a as (
  SELECT 
    --CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),TANGGAL_TRANSAKSI,120) trx_date
    TANGGAL_TRANSAKSI
    ,convert(decimal(18,2),SUM(TRANSACTION_TOTAL)/1000) transaction_frequency
  FROM QRIS.dbo.TRANSAKSI_MPM_OFF_US_SUMMARY_DAILY_SUCCESS_ONLY
  WHERE 
    DATEDIFF(DAY,TANGGAL_TRANSAKSI,GETDATE()) < 30 
  GROUP BY 
    TANGGAL_TRANSAKSI
    --CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),TANGGAL_TRANSAKSI,120)
)
select 
  SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR,TANGGAL_TRANSAKSI,105),1,2) trx_date
  ,transaction_frequency metrics_value
from a
order by a.TANGGAL_TRANSAKSI

panels.title: Volume Selisih Inflow Outflow Transaksi QRIS Daily (Rp Milyar)

themeEditor.name: custom

targets.rawSql:
with  a as (
  select 
    trx_date
    ,convert(decimal(18,2),sum(jumlah_transaksi)/1000) transaction_frequency    
  from [QRIS].[dbo].[incoming_QRIS_EXT_BRI_DAILY]
  where 
    datediff(MONTH, trx_date,getdate()) <= 3 --and rc ='00'
    --and convert(varchar(7), [date],120) >= '2023-06'
  group by 
    trx_date
)
select
year([trx_date]) as y,
month([trx_date]) as m
, SUBSTRING(convert(varchar,[trx_date],7),1,3) as trx_date
 ,sum(transaction_frequency) metrics_value
from a
group by year([trx_date]), month([trx_date]), SUBSTRING(convert(varchar,[trx_date],7),1,3)
order by year([trx_date]), month([trx_date]), SUBSTRING(convert(varchar,[trx_date],7),1,3)

with a as (
  select 
    TANGGAL_TRANSAKSI,
    convert(decimal(18,2), sum(TRANSACTION_TOTAL)/1000) as transaction_frequency    
  from QRIS.dbo.TRANSAKSI_MPM_OFF_US_SUMMARY_DAILY_SUCCESS_ONLY
  where 
    datediff(MONTH, TANGGAL_TRANSAKSI, getdate()) <= 3
    --and rc ='00'
    --and convert(varchar(7), [date],120) >= '2023-06'
  group by 
    TANGGAL_TRANSAKSI
),
b as (
  select
    year(a.TANGGAL_TRANSAKSI) as y,
    month(a.TANGGAL_TRANSAKSI) as m,
    SUBSTRING(convert(varchar, a.TANGGAL_TRANSAKSI, 7), 1, 3) as trx_date,
    sum(a.transaction_frequency) as metrics_value
  from a
  group by year(a.TANGGAL_TRANSAKSI), month(a.TANGGAL_TRANSAKSI), SUBSTRING(convert(varchar, a.TANGGAL_TRANSAKSI, 7), 1, 3)
)
select y, m, trx_date, metrics_value 
from b

panels.title: Volume Selisih Inflow Outflow Transaksi EDC Realtime (Rp Milyar)

themeEditor.name: custom

targets.rawSql:
WITH a1 AS (
  SELECT
    Tanggal,
    CONVERT(decimal(18, 2), SUM(TRANSACTION_TOTAL) / 1000) AS transaction_frequency
  FROM
    [DataAnalytics].dbo.[incoming_NPG_EXT_BRI_DAILY]
  WHERE
    DATEDIFF(DAY, Tanggal, GETDATE()) < 30 AND RC = '00'
  GROUP BY
    Tanggal
),
a2 AS (
  SELECT
    Tanggal,
    CONVERT(decimal(18, 2), SUM(TRANSACTION_TOTAL) / 1000) AS transaction_frequency
  FROM
    KartuKredit.dbo.[incoming_CC_EXT_BRI_DAILY]
  WHERE
    DATEDIFF(DAY, Tanggal, GETDATE()) < 30
  GROUP BY
    Tanggal
)
SELECT
  SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR, a1.Tanggal, 105), 1, 2) AS trx_date,
  a1.transaction_frequency + a2.transaction_frequency AS total_transaction_frequency
FROM
  a1
JOIN a2 ON a1.Tanggal = a2.Tanggal
ORDER BY
  a1.Tanggal;

WITH 
a AS (
  select 
    convert(DATE,[date]) as trx_date
    ,convert(decimal(18,2),sum(jumlah_transaksi)/1000) transaction_frequency
  from [DataAnalytics].dbo.[incoming_NPG_SummaryDaily]
  where 
    datediff(day, [date],getdate()) < 30   
    and rc ='00'
  group by [date]
),
b AS (
  SELECT 
    trx_date
    ,convert(decimal(18,2),SUM(TRANSACTION_TOTAL)/1000) transaction_frequency
  FROM KartuKredit.dbo.CC_OFF_US_SUMMARY_DAILY_SUCCESS_ONLY
  WHERE 
    DATEDIFF(DAY,trx_date,GETDATE()) < 30 
  GROUP BY trx_date
)
SELECT
  SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR,b.trx_date,105),1,2) as trx_date,
  a.transaction_frequency + b.transaction_frequency AS total_transaction_frequency
FROM
  b
JOIN a ON b.trx_date = a.trx_date	
order by b.trx_date

targets.rawSql:
with  a as (
  SELECT 
    Tanggal
    ,convert(decimal(18,2),SUM(TRANSACTION_AMOUNT)/1000000000) transaction_volume     
  FROM [DataAnalytics].dbo.[incoming_NPG_EXT_BRI_DAILY]
  WHERE 
    DATEDIFF(DAY,Tanggal,GETDATE()) < 30 AND RC = '00'
  GROUP BY 
    Tanggal
),
b as (
	SELECT 
    Tanggal
    ,convert(decimal(18,2),SUM(TRANSACTION_AMOUNT)/1000000000) transaction_volume     
  FROM KartuKredit.dbo.[incoming_CC_EXT_BRI_DAILY]
  WHERE 
    DATEDIFF(DAY,Tanggal,GETDATE()) < 30 
  GROUP BY 
    Tanggal
)
select 
  SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR,a.Tanggal,105),1,2) trx_date
  ,a.transaction_volume + b.transaction_volume as total_transaction_volume
FROM
  a
JOIN b ON a.Tanggal = b.Tanggal
ORDER BY
  a.Tanggal;

with  a as (
  select 
    [date] as trx_date
    ,convert(decimal(18,2),sum(sales_volume)/1000000000) transaction_volume     
  from [DataAnalytics].dbo.[incoming_NPG_SummaryDaily]
  where 
    datediff(day, [date],getdate()) < 30   
    and rc ='00'
  group by 
    [date]
), 
b as(
	select
	trx_date
    ,convert(decimal(18,2),SUM(TRANSACTION_AMOUNT)/1000000000) transaction_volume
  FROM KartuKredit.dbo.CC_OFF_US_SUMMARY_DAILY_SUCCESS_ONLY
  WHERE 
    DATEDIFF(DAY,trx_date,GETDATE()) < 30 
  GROUP BY 
    trx_date
)
select 
   SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR,a.trx_date,105),1,2) trx_date
  , a.transaction_volume + b.transaction_volume as total_transaction_volume 
FROM
  a
JOIN b ON a.trx_date = b.trx_date
ORDER BY
  a.trx_date;

targets.rawSql:
with  a as (
  select 
    trx_date
    ,convert(decimal(18,2),sum(jumlah_transaksi)/1000) transaction_frequency    
  from [QRIS].[dbo].[incoming_QRIS_EXT_BRI_DAILY]
  where 
    datediff(MONTH, trx_date,getdate()) <= 6 AND RC = '00'
    --and convert(varchar(7), [date],120) >= '2023-06'
  group by 
    trx_date
)
select
year([trx_date]) as y,
month([trx_date]) as m
, SUBSTRING(convert(varchar,[trx_date],7),1,3) as trx_date
 ,sum(transaction_frequency) metrics_value
from a
group by year([trx_date]), month([trx_date]), SUBSTRING(convert(varchar,[trx_date],7),1,3)
order by year([trx_date]), month([trx_date]), SUBSTRING(convert(varchar,[trx_date],7),1,3)

with a as (
  select 
    TANGGAL_TRANSAKSI,
    convert(decimal(18,2), sum(TRANSACTION_TOTAL)/1000) as transaction_frequency    
  from QRIS.dbo.TRANSAKSI_MPM_OFF_US_SUMMARY_DAILY_SUCCESS_ONLY
  where 
    datediff(MONTH, TANGGAL_TRANSAKSI, getdate()) <= 6
    --and rc ='00'
    --and convert(varchar(7), [date],120) >= '2023-06'
  group by 
    TANGGAL_TRANSAKSI
),
b as (
  select
    year(a.TANGGAL_TRANSAKSI) as y,
    month(a.TANGGAL_TRANSAKSI) as m,
    SUBSTRING(convert(varchar, a.TANGGAL_TRANSAKSI, 7), 1, 3) as trx_date,
    sum(a.transaction_frequency) as metrics_value
  from a
  group by year(a.TANGGAL_TRANSAKSI), month(a.TANGGAL_TRANSAKSI), SUBSTRING(convert(varchar, a.TANGGAL_TRANSAKSI, 7), 1, 3)
)
select y, m, trx_date, metrics_value 
from b 
where m in (1, 2, 3, 4);

panels.title: Summary Frekuensi Transaksi EDC Monthly (Ribu Transaksi)

themeEditor.name: custom

targets.rawSql:
with  a as (
  select 
    Tanggal
    ,convert(decimal(18,2),sum(TRANSACTION_TOTAL)/1000) as transaction_frequency    
  from [DataAnalytics].dbo.[incoming_NPG_EXT_BRI_DAILY]
  where 
    datediff(MONTH, Tanggal,getdate()) <= 3 AND RC = '00'
  group by 
    Tanggal
),
b as (
  select 
    Tanggal
    ,convert(decimal(18,2),sum(TRANSACTION_TOTAL)/1000) as transaction_frequency    
  from KartuKredit.dbo.[incoming_CC_EXT_BRI_DAILY]
  where 
    datediff(MONTH, Tanggal,getdate()) <= 3
  group by 
    Tanggal
)
select
  year(a.Tanggal) as y,
  month(a.Tanggal) as m,
  SUBSTRING(convert(varchar,a.Tanggal,7),1,3) as trx_date,
  sum(a.transaction_frequency + b.transaction_frequency) as total_transaction_frequency
from 
  a
  JOIN b ON a.Tanggal = b.Tanggal
group by 
  year(a.Tanggal), 
  month(a.Tanggal), 
  SUBSTRING(convert(varchar,a.Tanggal,7),1,3)
order by 
  year(a.Tanggal), 
  month(a.Tanggal), 
  SUBSTRING(convert(varchar,a.Tanggal,7),1,3);

with  a as (
  select 
    [date] as trx_date
    ,convert(decimal(18,2),sum(jumlah_transaksi)/1000) transaction_frequency     
  from [DataAnalytics].dbo.[incoming_NPG_SummaryDaily]
  where 
    datediff(MONTH, [date],getdate()) <= 3   
    and rc ='00'
    --and convert(varchar(7), [date],120) >= '2023-06'
  group by 
    [date]
),
b as (
	  select 
    trx_date
    ,convert(decimal(18,2),sum(TRANSACTION_TOTAL)/1000) transaction_frequency   
  from KartuKredit.dbo.CC_OFF_US_SUMMARY_DAILY_SUCCESS_ONLY
  where 
    datediff(MONTH, trx_date,getdate()) <= 3 --and rc ='00'
    --and convert(varchar(7), [date],120) >= '2023-06'
  group by 
    trx_date
)
select
year(a.trx_date) as y,
month(a.trx_date) as m
, SUBSTRING(convert(varchar,a.trx_date,7),1,3) as trx_date
  -- month([date]) monthly
 ,sum(a.transaction_frequency + b.transaction_frequency) as total_transaction_frequency 
from 
  a
  JOIN b ON a.trx_date= b.trx_date
group by 
  year(a.trx_date), 
  month(a.trx_date), 
  SUBSTRING(convert(varchar,a.trx_date,7),1,3)
order by 
  year(a.trx_date), 
  month(a.trx_date), 
  SUBSTRING(convert(varchar,a.trx_date,7),1,3);
